```
    >>> f'Magic wand: {  bag['wand']  }'
     ^
    SyntaxError: invalid syntax 
    ```

```
    >>> f'Magic wand { bag[\'wand\'] } string'
    SyntaxError: f-string expression portion cannot include a backslash 
    ```

```
    >>> f'''A complex trick: {
    ... bag['bag']  # recursive bags!
    ... }'''
    SyntaxError: f-string expression part cannot include '#' 
    ```

```
    >>> f"These are the things: {", ".join(things)}"

    >>> f"{source.removesuffix(".py")}.c: $(srcdir)/{source}"

    >>> f"{f"{f"infinite"}"}" + " " + f"{f"nesting!!!"}" 
    ```

```
    >>> a = ["hello", "world"]
    >>> f"{'\n'.join(a)}"
    File "<stdin>", line 1
     f"{'\n'.join(a)}"
     ^
    SyntaxError: f-string expression part cannot include a backslash 
    ```

```
    >>> a = ["hello", "world"]
    >>> joined = '\n'.join(a)
    >>> f"{joined}"
    'hello\nworld' 
    ```

```
    >>> a = ["hello", "world"]
    >>> f"{'\n'.join(a)}"
    'hello\nworld' 
    ```

```
fstring
    | FSTRING_START fstring_middle* FSTRING_END
fstring_middle
    | fstring_replacement_field
    | FSTRING_MIDDLE
fstring_replacement_field
    | '{' (yield_expr | star_expressions) "="? [ "!" NAME ] [ ':' fstring_format_spec* ] '}'
fstring_format_spec:
    | FSTRING_MIDDLE
    | fstring_replacement_field 
```

```
f'some words {a+b:.3f} more words {c+d=} final words' 
```

```
FSTRING_START - "f'"
FSTRING_MIDDLE - 'some words '
LBRACE - '{'
NAME - 'a'
PLUS - '+'
NAME - 'b'
OP - ':'
FSTRING_MIDDLE - '.3f'
RBRACE - '}'
FSTRING_MIDDLE - ' more words '
LBRACE - '{'
NAME - 'c'
PLUS - '+'
NAME - 'd'
OP - '='
RBRACE - '}'
FSTRING_MIDDLE - ' final words'
FSTRING_END - "'" 
```

```
FSTRING_START - 'f"""'
FSTRING_MIDDLE - 'some words'
FSTRING_END - '"""' 
```

```
>>> f" something {  my_dict["key"]  } something else " 
```

```
    def py2c(source):
        prefix = source.removesuffix(".py")
        return f"{prefix}.c" 
    ```

```
    def py2c(source):
        return f"{source.removesuffix(".py")}.c" 
    ```

```
    >>> f'Useless use of lambdas: {  lambda  x: x*2 }'
    SyntaxError: unexpected EOF while parsing 
    ```

```
    >>> f'Useless use of lambdas: {  (lambda  x:  x*2)  }' 
    ```
